rules.description: Change spacebar to hyper. (Post spacebar if pressed alone)
Change left_command to left_control. (Post escape if pressed alone)
Change left_option to left_option. (Post _ if pressed alone)

manipulators.description: Change right_command to right_command.(Post ( if pressed alone)
Change caps_lock to command+control+option(hyper2).(Post caps_lock if pressed alone)
Finder C-y paste by move(similiar of C-x, C-v on window)
Finder hyper2-v paste by move(similiar of C-x, C-v on window)

rules.description: Mplayer l=right进,h=left退,j=down(快退),k=up(快进),u=快放，d=慢放,q=quit

manipulators.description: iterm ctrl-f3 switch to emacs emacs
Xcode ctrl-return open in external editor

rules.description: 按 left_shift 切换系统英文和 RIME 输入法

manipulators.description: 按 left_shift 切换系统英文和 RIME 输入法
按 left_shift 切换RIME 输入法
emacs按 left_shift 切换RIME 输入法
emacs按 ctrl-g 切换english 输入法
